snippet: Johnny O’Neal left New York more than two decades ago just as he was making a name for himself in jazz circles; now he’s back in town and trying to get his career on track.
abstract: Pianist Johnny O’Neal is back in New York, trying to get his career on track after leaving more than two decades ago just as he was making name for himself in jazz circles; his Live at Smalls album is his first in 12 years.
lead_paragraph: Johnny O’Neal left New York more than two decades ago just as he was making a name for himself in jazz circles; now he’s back in town and trying to get his career on track.

headline.seo: After Vanishing, Johnny O’Neal Has a New York Following Again
headline.main: A Piano Great Is Back, Singing a Gusty Blues
headline.print_headline: A Piano Great Is Back, Singing a Gusty Blues
